Blog.post: 1. Ill Nino - This Times For Real 2. Breed 77 - The River 3. Drowning Pool - Tear Away 4. Billy Talent - River Below 5. Nightwish - Nemo 6. Ozzy Osbourne - Perry Mason 7. Billy Talent - Try Honesty 8. Andrew W.K. - Fun Night 9. Ill Nino - How Can I Live 10. Nightwish - Moondance

THERE IS NO FUCKING WAY THAT WE SHOULD HAVE LOST THAT!!! THE FUCKING REFEREE WAS FUCKING BIASED!!! THAT REFEREE DESERVES ALL THE HASSLE HE GETS!!! HE'S A DISGRACE TO ALL THE DECENT REFEREES AND IS'NT FIT FOR REFEREEING INTERNATIONAL GAMES!!! THAT GOAL SHUD NOT HAVE BEEN DISALLOWED!!! WE SHUD HAVE WON FAIR AND SQUARE!!! YOU CAN SAY THAT ITS ONLY A GAME ALL YOU FUCKING LIKE BUT I WON'T FORGET THAT REFEREES FACE! IF WE HAD LOST FAIRLY I WUD HAVE ACCEPTED IT BUT TO LOSE TO A DECISION LIKE THAT!!! ITS A FUCKING DISGRACE!!!

Here is a new list of my Top Ten Tracks. Both this and the Top Ten Bands will be updated weekly. 1. Andrew W.K.-Party Hard 2. Slipknot-Duality 3. Staind-Price To Play 4. Trapt-Headstrong 5. P.O.D.-Alive 6. Probot-Shake Your Blood 7. Korn-Right Now 8. Linkin Park-My December 9. Ill Nino-This Times For Real 10. Drowning Pool-Step Up

Life is hard but i'm living. There is no way I'm gonna let this shit get me down it's not worth it. I'm almost over everything. I'm not gonna stop trying to get over it all. I've got to live with what I got. I've still got hope. I've lived on hope before and I can do it again.

One, two and three remain the same this week with new entries from Ill Nino at number 4 and Andrew W.K. at number 5. Due to these new entries Q.O.T.S.A. and R.A.T.M are knocked out of the top ten. Guns 'N' Roses and Evanescence do not appeal to me this week and also leave the top ten. Metallica have moved up to number 6 and Iron Maiden stay at number 7. korn have slipped down to number 8 but remain in the top ten. Staind enter at number 9 and to finish off the top ten Beastie Boys join the rest. So the top ten this week stands as follows: 1. Linkin Park 2. P.O.D. 3. Slipknot 4. Ill Nino 5. Andrew W.K. 6. Metallica 7. Iron Maiden 8. Korn 9. Staind 10. Beastie Boys

Enger-land, Enger-land, Enger-land, Enger-land, La La. I thought we would win. Against a team like Croatia you can never be sure tho, but hey we won. Lets see if they can perform like that against Portugal.
My top 10 bands are: 1. Linkin Park 2. P.O.D. 3. Slipknot 4. Korn 5. Guns 'N' Roses 6. Evanescence 7. Iron Maiden 8. Metallica 9. Queens of The Stone Age 10. Rage Against The Machine
A BIG BIG thank you too Leanne as well. You've bin there for me a lot and have helped me get thru sum difficult times. BIG hugs to everyone for what they have done to help me.

A BIG BIG thank you to all my friends who have bin there for me. I appreciate everything you have done for me. Thanks go especially to Lou, Rachel, Kym, Martin and Neil. You have all been a lot of help. You've bin there for me to talk to and sum of you have given me help. You're all great friends and it's an honour to know you.

FUCK THAT! I'm not goin thru the next few weeks bein depressed about this shit. Why shud I be depressed. There'll be others. I jus need to live life by the day. I don't need to be depressed. I shud be happy. Only a few weeks left til I leave school. WOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!!! Then I can listen to loud music a lot of the time. PARTY!!!

Well that seems to be the end of that. Seems that there has been a change in both me and Louise and it seems that it will never be the same as before. So, I shud jud try and move on again. I'm now single and there's n that i've seen that I like. Depression seems to be the only thing that comes out of relationships for me. Maybe I am better off single. Wot do you think?

For all those who don't know about foamy I have one thing to say. U shud go and watch these cartoons at the first chance you get. U won't know wot ur missing if u don't. http://www.illwillpress.com/vault.html Go watch and enjoy.

I still like Louise but I don't know whether she thinks things can be the same as they were before. I jus wanna feel how I felt when I was with her before. It was the happiest I had been in my short life of seventeen years. She really was the best g/f i've ever had. and I miss what we had 2gether. I know she was happy when she went out with me and she even stayed with me a lot when I wasn't too well at a gig. I don't think I ever told her how much I appreciated that. But thats all gone and now i'm finding it hard cos I miss the happiness I had.

Well as the name says. Life is beginning to suck again. I'm enjoyin my time alone and everything that I have but I jus miss the feeling I get when I have a g/f. I especially miss all the hugs I get. :( Well done Neil. U made the right choice. U've taken the easy path thru life.

Well what can I say. The days are jus starting to get more and more boring. No one seems to be on msn for long nemore and even when they are on they don't say much to me. I go to adams house 2moz nite but I got nothing to do friday nite. Help me! I'm gonna be so bored.

Here you will get to know about me. I will hopefully post on here every day but there are no guarentees. Depends on my mood on each day. I will post about computer/video games, music, Magic the Gathering cards and anything that I can think of. I will occasionally ask for advice on certain matters. If I do I hope that you will comment on my problem and share your wisdom with me. If you have any questions just include it in a comment of this post and I will try and answer it. Thanks.
While you're here feel free to express any feelings you have in pretty much any way you want. No holds barred so to speak. LINKIN PARK RULE!!!

I got dragged to see some friends in loughborough yesterday but we went into town and I managed to find a cd that I havn't seen in Grantham. I got Breed 77 - Cultura and its the only CD that i've listened to since. It is brilliant! BREED 77 RULE!!!
